thread.title: LTE Smartphone Market in Europe to Grow at 47.25% CAGR By 2019
thread.title_full: LTE Smartphone Market in Europe to Grow at 47.25% CAGR By 2019

author: prbuzz.com
title: LTE Smartphone Market in Europe to Grow at 47.25% CAGR By 2019
text:
The report titled LTE Smartphone Market – Europe Outlook (2015-19) showcases an in-depth analysis of the market in terms of market size in Europe, average price and shipments. This report also forecasts the growth numbers till 2019 (on a YoY basis) and hence suggests the Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) for the estimated period.
Startup smartphone vendors to overtake established brands
Europe has a wide LTE network coverage with more than half of the telecom operators with LTE data service offerings. Western Europe has higher LTE subscription rate in comparison to Eastern Europe, which was awarded the spectrum later. Germany, France, Sweden and UK are at the forefront of introducing LTE in Europe.
Increase in mobile broadband penetration in the region has driven individuals towards adoption of LTE smartphones. Some of the startup firms like Wiko, BQ etc. have gained traction in the market with smartphones offered at almost half the cost of flagship models from established brands. Due to the entry of a number of startups offering LTE smartphones at affordable price and better specifications, competitiveness has increased in the region. This will force vendors to drop prices and improve customer base.
European market for LTE smartphones is expected to grow more as prices of devices are decreasing and purchasing power of people to buy LTE based smartphone has increased. Besides, the increasing number of telecom operators deploying 4G networks to meet the growing demand for mobile internet services guarantee growth of LTE smartphones in Europe.
Market Segments and Forecasts Covered in the Report
The Global LTE Smartphone market is segmented by:
· Regions (North America, Europe, APAC, South America, RoW)
· Average Price (Global, North America, Europe, APAC, South America, RoW)
· Shipment (Global, North America, Europe, APAC, South America, RoW)
Companies discussed in the Global LTE Smartphone market research report are Apple, Samsung, LG Electronics, Huawei, Xiaomi, Sony, Lenovo, Motorola, HTC, ZTE, Nokia, OnePlus, Oppo, Pantech, Acer, Gionee, NEC, Asus, Alcatel and Lava
